channel.title: online on AWMP
channel.description: Recent content in online on AWMP

item.title: Hybrid conferences group
item.description: Participating in conferences is crucial, especially for young researchers. Therefore, this working group investigates ways of improving participation of underrepresented groups in our community. As a first important aspect, we work on a survey on the effects of organizing conferences in hybrid form.

item.title: Website
item.description: A group working on the dissemination of AWMP activities and projects via a website.
